Test Name: Hemiplegic Migraine with or without Epilepsy Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Blood, saliva, or buccal swab (genomic DNA)
Purpose: To detect and characterize genetic variants associated with hemiplegic migraine with or without epilepsy for diagnostic and clinical management purposes.
Container: Appropriate collection device for sample type (e.g., EDTA tube for blood, saliva collection kit, sterile buccal swab tube)
Equipment: NanoDrop spectrophotometer, thermal cycler, Qubit fluorometer, Agilent Bioanalyzer, Illumina MiSeq/NextSeq sequencer
